participant_1.name: Victor
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Victor loves to talk and share stories.
participant_1.background: my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i've a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Sophie enjoys quiet moments and intellectual conversations.
participant_2.background: i like to play chess. i don't drink alcohol. i am in my thirties. i love taking bubble baths.
